title: The Old Woman: What Are You Afraid of? A Wide Black Hole! It Is Empty, Perhaps? (La Vieille: Que crains-tu? Un large trou noir! Il est vide, peut-être?) (plate XVII) from La Tentation de Saint-Antoine
medium: Lithograph from an illustrated book with 22 lithographs on chine appliqué and 21 wood engravings (including wrapper and table of plates)
